section.sectiontext: The following are the prescribed certification fees for the purposes of section 30 (1) (b) [issuance of certificate] of the Act:

paragraph.paragraphtext: $245 for an applicant who has a degree in education from a post-secondary institution established in Canada;
$395 for an applicant who has a degree in education from a post-secondary institution established outside Canada;

$245 for an applicant who applies for a certificate of qualification for which a degree in education from a post-secondary institution is not required by the certification standards or the independent school teaching certification standards.

subsection.subsectiontext: The following are the prescribed fees for the purposes of section 37 [annual practice fee] of the Act:

paragraph.paragraphtext: the annual practice fee is $80 for a person who is issued a certificate of qualification between June 1 and November 30;
the annual practice fee is $40 for a person who is issued a certificate of qualification between December 1 and May 31;
the late fee under section 37 (2) of the Act is $30;
the additional late fee under section 37 (3) (b) of the Act is $30.
